api_list.api_description: Retrieves all entries in a given category.

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: The category to retrieve entries from.

api_list.api_description: Add a caption to an Imgflip meme template.

required_parameters.name: template_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the template to use.

optional_parameters.name: font
optional_parameters.description: Font family to use for the text. Defaults to 'impact'.

optional_parameters.name: max_font_size
optional_parameters.description: Maximum font size in pixels. Defaults to 50.

optional_parameters.name: boxes
optional_parameters.description: Configurations for creating memes with more than two text boxes.

query: Can you list all the monsters from Zelda: Breath of the Wild? I also want to create a meme using the 'Success Kid' template with the text 'Explored Hyrule', 'Still Alive'.
